name: BustGhoster
description:
This is my entry for Trijam #152

Jam's theme was "Leave me alone!" 

In this game you are a muscular gunman (Because everbody knows it's illegal for main characters to not be muscular) who tries to avoid ghosts. You have 3 lives and when ghosts touch you they took one of your lives. You need to be alone for surviving. Also you have a gun and you can shoot the ghosts. There is a little twist though, your gun shoots bullets that can bounce from walls.

With every new level you also get one more bounce. In level 1 your bullet bounces once, in level two it bounces twice... you get the idea

Just don't get busted by ghosts for one minute and a portal opens to take you in next level. Easy, right... Right?

CONTROLS: 

WASD for moving your character

Mouse for looking around

Left mouse button or space for shooting

I couldn't complete it on 3 hours so I had to overtime, this game is NOT made in 3 hours. It took 4 hours and 25 minutes for me to make this completely

Assets:

I made everything except paper texture in the background. I found it from jooinn.com
